Perks are comparable to the level 5 Geniekind as opposed to the level 8 Holy Aura. Select this to only do the replacement for Angel. Requires Reward Feature Conversion for Dawn Of Dragons to be active

CustomRewardForEveryone.Description: Do the replacement for everyone, not just Angel.
